suppress.notes: file name: antisamy-1.5.7.jar antisamy has an XSS vulnerability which is not exposed in the current use but we should update and remove this suppression when a fix is made available.
file name: slf4j-api-1.8.0-beta2.jar the vulnerability is fixed in 1.8.0-beta2 but is still registering as a false negative
file name: slf4j-simple-1.8.0-beta2.jar the vulnerability is fixed in 1.8.0-beta2 but is still registering as a false negative
